plot outline: Bangalore, India. A poor cab driver needs 300 thousand rupees within 24 hours for his dying mothers surgery. Nowhere to go, he takes up an errand for the underworld, to transport an item from one point to another within 3 hours, from 9pm to 12 midnight. The 3 hours journey takes him through a city tense from the shock of multiple bomb explosions, encounters with a brutal police cracking down on the terrorist - underworld nexus, a trigger happy cop who hitches a ride with him, and incidents that make him question the righteousness of his choices. Can he finish his task on time under the nose of the cop while battling his conscience OR has he bitten off more than he can chew ??
